alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 9:45AM EST until further notice by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Merrimack and Belknap Counties. For the Suncook River...including North Chichester...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flooding occurs at about 20 camp sites at the Lazy River Campground. Flooding also begins at the Epsom Valley Campground. At 10.0 feet, The lower section of the Lazy River Campground floods. Two campsites at the Epsom Valley Campground flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EST Friday the stage was 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 10.7 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
